About Me

BIO

I graduated from Universtiy of Manitoba with physics degree. The research experience opened the gate of programming for me. After graduation, I started a side project which can combine two of my passion videography and cooking. I uploaded my videos to Bilibili.com later on I started blogging on Wechat and worked with Duitang.com. Currently I'm working on my own brand, building personal website from scratch, learning HTML/CSS and Javascript. After all this experience, I decide to pursue a new career path which is front end developer, hopefully I could become a full stack developer one day.
